title: There should be a AP equivalent to Death's Dance
body:
Why do AD champions get all the fun with itemization?

I feel like this item would work great with AP champions. In fact, I think it will be more balance considering the fact that AP champions can't even life steal back.

It redirects 30% of the damage into DOT, which is helpful for sure in burst fights that you can sustain from, however it is not as good in long drawn out fights that you can not keep up. I do not agree that a mage needs that kinda thing though.....

They have a hard enough time figuring out how to stay alive without dieing to worry about dieing after they get out of a fight because they have no way to heal themself.

UNIQUE: Stores 30% of all physical and magic damage received, and is taken as damage over time true damage instead, dealing one-third of the stored damage every second.

Patch before last? I think. Coulda been last patch, cant remember.

So, with your suggestion of adding in a AP equivalent of Death's Dance...
This makes me ask:

- Do you want something like a Cass getting healed for a lot of HP for every tick of her poison and every E she lands on someone? 
- Do you want a Kass healing everytime he damages someone from his ult?
- Do you want Vlad to become the true drain tank out of every champion?
- Do you want Rumble to heal from every single one of his nigh-spammable spells?
- Do you want Teemo to turn the map into his personal fountain by just shrooming the map?
- Do you want Ziggs to heal from endless wave-clearing and sieging?
- Do you want Brand to heal off a ton of HP by just facerolling in a teamfight?
- Do you want Syndra to heal for a lot of HP just by pressing R at someone?
- **Do you want any mage to heal just by pressing a button at something while at the safety of their range?**

Because I certainly don't want to encounter stuff like this. Ideas like these are the reason why Spell Vamp was removed from the game.
